from dataclasses import dataclass
import numpy as np

@dataclass
class TimeSeriesDTO:
    values: np.ndarray
    times: np.ndarray

def diff_helper(series: TimeSeriesDTO) -> TimeSeriesDTO:
    diff_values = np.diff(series.values)
    diff_times = series.times[1:]  # rightâ€‘aligned
    return TimeSeriesDTO(values=diff_values, times=diff_times)

# * plot second derivative
diff1_dto = TimeSeriesDTO(values=diff1, times=diff1_times)
diff2_dto = diff_helper(diff1_dto)
plot(diff2_dto.times, diff2_dto.values, color="indigo", linewidth=1, shift=shift__diff2, label_end="diff2")
reasoning_content: User wants to modify diff_helper to use DTO. Need to create DTO class with values and times. Return that. Also adjust calls. Provide code snippet.
